list.name: Default
list.comment: Lots more formatting, blacksmith store works now

task.summary: added dodge, added class perks, changed battle text a little. This is the last update for a while... My wrists hurt.
added dodge, added class perks, changed battle text a little. This is the last update for a while... My wrists hurt.
new enemy names, slightly shorter. Less silly or nonsensical
Added a Blacksmith. He repairs for gold
general fixes for stats and leveling.
reworked the math once again, is starting to get challenging around level 5
one more committ before I restructure and condense the game.py
restructured a lot of classes to be under Hero.py. Much less global vars now.
Finally got all 5 items working! Shops are next
Added asthetic methods to make it look pretty
More asethetics, fixed HP and ATK when leveling up
Added a good DB to the repository
Some minor formatting of how gear prints
Lots more formatting, blacksmith store works now

MESSAGE.value: Fixed enemy naming, fixed combat order
removed unnecessary print statement
removed experimental nonblocking added saves folder working out some bugs
save now saves gear as well.
major data overhaul, weapons weren't applying to right classes, now they do.
Recreated heavy database into lighter one.
added gold and dodge chance. Dodge chance >=3 will give chance of dodge
